    • Constructor Detail

      • Mana

        public Mana(float currentMana,
            float manaCap,
            int mana_pool_spell_initial_cost,
            int mana_pool_spell_cost_increase_per_use,
            float mana_pool_spell_cap_multiplier,
            float mana_pool_spell_mana_gained_multiplier,
            float initialManaGainedPerSecond)
        contain mana information
        Parameters:
        currentMana - current hp the mana have
        manaCap - max amount of hp the mana can have
        mana_pool_spell_initial_cost - initial cost of the spell, in mana
        mana_pool_spell_cost_increase_per_use - How much the spellâ€™s cost should increase after each use.
        mana_pool_spell_cap_multiplier - The multiplier to use for increasing the mana cap when the spell is cast
        mana_pool_spell_mana_gained_multiplier - The use for increasing mana gained from killing monsters and the mana trickle when the spell is cast.
        initialManaGainedPerSecond - amount of mana you can gain per second

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public void display(processing.core.PApplet applet,
                    ActionButton doubleSpeed,
                    ActionButton stop,
                    boolean pause)
        use to display the mana and set the amount of mana you can gain per second when actionbuttons are involved
        Parameters:
        applet - use to draw the mana bar
        doubleSpeed - when double speed is set on, the amount of mana increase is double as well
        stop - when pause button is set, 0 amount of mana is increased
        pause - set true when player lose the game. The mana gain per second will become 0 as well.
